title: I NEED HELP!
body: So I was playing in a league game, during the game I hit a lot of buttons on my keyboard and something happened to my game. But since that moment, whenever I have something like a YouTube video or Pandora playing on my dual monitor, my FPS drops by half, making the game unplayable. This never happened before. If someone could help me fix my problem that would be life saving! Thanks.

replies.body:
That's really strange! I suspect this may be a result of enabling the Xbox DVR feature or changing your graphics settings. First, ensure your in-game VIDEO settings are all squared away. If they are, then I recommend [disabling](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) the Windows game bar entirely if you're running Windows 10. 

Let me know if you still encounter FPS issues.
